annotations.text: COMMISSION DECISION

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 27 December 2002

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: on the application of Article 6 of the Directive 2000/26/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 May 2000 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to insurance against civil liability in respect of the use of motor vehicles and amending Council Directives 73/239/EEC and 88/357/EEC
annotations.translation: 关于适用欧洲议会和理事会 2000 年 5 月 16 日关于成员国有关机动车辆使用民事责任保险的法律近似化的第 2000/26/EC 号指令第 6 条，并对理事会第 73/239/EEC 号指令和第 88/357/EEC 号指令进行了修正

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: (notified under document number C(2002)5304)

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: (Text with EEA relevance)

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Directive 2000/26/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 May 2000 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to insurance against civil liability in respect of the use of motor vehicles and amending Council Directives 73/239/EEC and 88/357/EEC (¹), and in particular Article 6(3)(b) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到欧洲议会和理事会 2000 年 5 月 16 日第 2000/26/EC 号指令，该指令涉及各成员国在机动车辆使用民事责任保险方面的法律近似化，并对理事会第 73/239/EEC 号和第 88/357/EEC 号指令 (¹)，特别是其中第 6(3)(b) 条进行了修正，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) The Directive 2000/26/EC (fourth motor insurance Directive) lays down special provisions applicable to injured parties resident in a Member State and entitled to compensation in respect of any loss or injury resulting from accidents occurring in a Member State other than the Member State of residence of the injured party or in third countries whose national insurer's bureaux have joined the green card system whenever such accidents are caused by the use of vehicles insured and normally based in a Member State.
annotations.translation: (1) 第 2000/26/EC 号指令（第四号机动车保险指令）作出了特殊规定，适用于居住在某一成员国的受害方，如果因使用通常位于某一成员国并在该国投保的车辆而造成事故，则有权就受害方居住国以外的其他成员国境内发生的意外事故，或在其本国保险局已加入绿卡制度的第三国发生的意外事故所造成的损失或伤害获得赔偿。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) According to Article 6(1) and Article 10(3) of the fourth Directive, each Member State shall establish or approve before 20 January 2002 a compensation body responsible for providing compensation where the insurance undertaking has failed to appoint a representative or is manifestly dilatory in settling a claim. Furthermore, as provided for in Article 7, the injured party is entitled to apply for compensation from the compensation body in the Member State where he resides if it is impossible to identify the vehicle or if, within two months following the accident, it is impossible to identify the insurance undertaking.
annotations.translation: (2) 根据第四号指令第 6(1) 条和第 10(3) 条，每个成员国应在 2002 年 1 月 20 日之前设立或批准一个赔偿机构，负责在保险企业未能指定代表或在解决索赔方面明显拖延时提供赔偿。此外，根据第 7 条的规定，如果无法确定车辆或在事故发生后两个月内无法确定保险企业，受害方有权向其居住国的赔偿机构申请赔偿。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) In accordance with the provisions of Article 6(2) of the fourth Directive, the compensation body of a Member State which has compensated an injured party residing in that Member State shall be entitled to claim reimbursement of the sum paid by way of compensation from the compensation body in the Member State in which the insurance undertaking which issued the policy of the presumed liable party is established.
annotations.translation: (3) 根据第四号指令第 6(2) 条的规定，成员国向居住在该成员国的受害方提供赔偿的赔偿机构有权要求签发推定责任方保险单的保险企业所在成员国的赔偿机构补偿已支付的赔偿金。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) By virtue of Article 6 (3)(a) of the fourth Directive, the entry into force of Article 6 of the fourth Directive is subject to the conclusion of an agreement between the compensation bodies established or approved by the Member States defining their functions and obligations and the procedures for reimbursement.
annotations.translation: (4) 根据第四号指令第 6(3)(a) 条，第四号指令第 6 条的生效取决于成员国设立或批准的赔偿机构之间就其职能和义务以及补偿程序达成协议。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) All the Member States have designated the compensation bodies responsible for providing compensation to injured parties in the cases referred to in Article 1 of the fourth motor insurance Directive, as provided for by its Article 6. An agreement between these compensation bodies according to this provision was concluded on 29 April 2002 in Brussels and notified to the European Commission by letter dated 19 July 2002 within the deadline established by Article 10(3) of the same Directive.
annotations.translation: (5) 所有成员国都指定了赔偿机构，负责根据第四号机动车保险指令第 6 条的规定，在该指令第 1 条所述的情况下向受害方提供赔偿。根据该规定，这些赔偿机构之间于 2002 年 4 月 29 日在布鲁塞尔达成协议，并在同一指令第 10(3) 条规定的期限内于 2002 年 7 月 19 日致函通知欧盟委员会。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Article 6(3)(b) calls on the Commission to fix the date from which Article 6 of the fourth Directive shall take effect, and the Commission has already ascertained, after consulting the Insurance Committee, the conclusion of this agreement.
annotations.translation: 第 6(3)(b) 条要求委员会确定第四号指令第 6 条的生效日期，委员会在与保险委员会协商后已经确定了该协议的缔结日期。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (7) In accordance with Article 10(1) of the fourth motor insurance Directive, Member States shall apply the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with it before 20 January 2003,
annotations.translation: (7) 根据第四号机动车保险指令第 10(1) 条，各成员国应在 2003 年 1 月 20 日之前适用遵守该指令的必要的法律、条例和行政规定，
